example.eg: The narrow road made passing other cars difficult.
There are a narrow range of acceptable outcomes.
example.egtrans: 可接受的结果数量有限。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 数量有限的, 选择范围狭窄的

example.eg: NASA had a narrow time period to launch the rocket.
Her interests are narrow, limited to science and logic.
example.egtrans: 她的兴趣比较狭窄，限于科学和逻辑。

example.eg: The zealot has a narrow view of history.
example.egtrans: 那些独论断者对历史的看法十分狭隘。

example.eg: There are specialised pilots to guide boats through the narrows.
example.egtrans: 有专门的领航员指引船只通过海峡。

example.eg: The road narrows up ahead, becoming a single lane.
example.egtrans: 道路在前方会变窄，变成单车道。

example.eg: He narrowed his search to a smaller area.
example.egtrans: 他把搜索范围缩小到更小区域。

example.eg: The police have now narrowed their search to a smaller area.
example.egtrans: 警察缩小了搜索范围，在更小的区域中开展行动。

example.eg: Given our narrow resources, we vacation at home.
example.egtrans: 鉴于我们经费有限，我们就在家度假。

example.eg: Giving the police as detailed a description as you can of the mugger will narrow down their search.
example.egtrans: 尽可能详细地向警方描述抢劫犯的样子，可以帮助警方缩小搜寻范围。

dsense.name: by a narrow margin, by a small margin

example.eg: He was elected president by a narrow margin.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 比分相差不大地, 以微弱多数胜地

example.eg: Mary had a narrow escape when a car nearly hit her.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 险险逃脱, 幸免于难

dsense.name: narrow [sth] down to [sth], narrow down [sth] to [sth]

example.eg: When choosing a college, it is important to narrow down your options to only three or four colleges.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把范围缩小到, 局限在

example.eg: That was such a narrow fail, you only needed two more points to pass.
The trains in Lithuania run on a narrow gauge.
He passed the exam but by a very narrow margin.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 没有多少余裕, 差距很小

example.eg: We put her in tutoring to try to narrow the gap between her reading level and what it should be.
I'm not so narrow-minded as to impose my personal taste on others.
example.egtrans: 我没有那么心胸狭窄，不会把自己的个人喜好强加给别人。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 思想狭隘的, 心胸狭窄的, 气量狭小的
心胸狭窄, 思想短浅

example.eg: Matt has always lived his life on the straight and narrow; he's never even gotten a parking ticket!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 规规矩矩地做人, 正派的做人之道
中规中矩, 循规蹈矩
